Articles.Content:
Says I don\'t have permission. bought is today

>

Make sure your password only contains alpha-numeric characters. You can change this from your Store profile.

Also, try running the patcher directly instead of from the game.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Hi,

i have the same problem.

I reset my password (yes it is alphanumeric) and started the updater manually but i still get the error that i am not allowed to patch.

(And yes i also own the game).

Okay, since neither of you mentioned it, what version of KSP are you trying to update?

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

This may seem like an extra thing that ought to go unsaid, but just in case...

The patcher can\'t handle having spaces in the password either (my favourite security measure ). Ensure you have ONLY letters and numbers in the password. Nothing else.

And, the patcher only works on version 14.2.

If you bought today, this is probably not the issue. But if you have version 14 (like I did) the patcher won\'t work anymore. In that case you should first log in to the store and download 14.2, then run the patcher to get 14.3.

Im the same all my details seem to have stopped working at present I cant update. At present I can login to this forum but cant login to the store? any ideas anyone. I have passed onto the help desk but thought someone might have a quick fix, it also thinks that I have not purchased the game

???
Your store login isn\'t the same as your forum one; you should have received an email with your login details, check your spam folder.

Hi thanks for the reply

unfortunatley I cant remember what password i used for this I have tried to reset but i didnt recieve an email to inform me of the new password Starting to loose the will to live >
Really make sure that its not in your junk folder. Kerbal always goes to my spam folder under my hotmail address (which puts almost nothing in the junk folder).

Hi

Have checked my junk folder nothing in there but in the mean time have had a new password sent from KSP support and this also is saying password incorrect so now really getting fed up with it all anyone got any ideas? ???

Just to make sure I have this correct... You were sent a new Store password by support and it works in the Store, but not in the Patcher?

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Hi

Thanks for the reply I now can log in ok it appears that had forgot to do something at their end when they reset my password but all good now ;D
